reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Frame Agreement with NGO (Plan International Finland Foundation)

description.narrative: The project targets children between 0 and 18 years both as beneficiaries of rehabilitation services and, where applicable, as active stakeholders of the CBR programme. The family members of Children with Disabilities (CwD) will be targeted for training in community-based rehabilitation. Furthermore, the project will work with the duty bearers to improve CwDs framework to assure their quality of life also by providing basic services adapted to the needs of CwDs.The project will build the capacities of the c ommunity and secondary service providers in order to support the CBR programmes, will also sensitise the entire community on the CwDs? rights and CBR programmes to the reduction of marginalisation and discrimination of CwDs, contribute to strength the lega l framework on CwDs, and build partnership and networks on local, district, regional, national, and international levels, to promote the CBR approach focused on disabled children?s protection and participation.
